name: Naoto Hori
body:
### Publications
Coarse-grained structure-based model for RNA-protein complexes developed by fluctuation matching
N Hori, S Takada
Journal of Chemical Theory and Computation 8(9) 3384-3394 Jul 2012

CafeMol: A coarse-grained biomolecular simulator for simulating proteins at work
H Kenzaki, N Koga, N Hori, R Kanada, W Li, K Okazaki, XQ Yao, S Takada
Journal of Chemical Theory and Computation 7(6) 1979-1989 May 2011

Multiscale methods for protein folding simulations.
W Li, H Yoshii, N Hori, T Kameda, S Takada
Methods (San Diego, Calif.) 52(1) 106-114 Sep 2010

Folding energy landscape and network dynamics of small globular proteins.
N Hori, G Chikenji, RS Berry, S Takada
Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America 106(1) 73-78 Dec 2008

[[Other presentations|presentations.md]]

### Academic & Professional Experience
* Feb 2014 - Today, Postdoctoral fellow,  Institute for Physical Science and Technology, University of Maryland
* Apr 2013 - Dec 2013, Postdoctoral fellow, Graduate School of Science, Kyoto University
* Apr 2010 - Mar 2013, Research Fellow, Japan Society for the Promotion of Science
* Apr 2009 - Mar 2010, Research Associate, Graduate School of Science, Kyoto University
* Apr 2008 - Mar 2009, Software engineer, Kozo Keikaku Engineering Inc.

### Education
* Apr 2010 - Mar 2013, Kyoto University Graduate School of Science Department of Biophysics
* Apr 2006 - Mar 2008, Kobe University Graduate School of Science and Technology Department of Chemistry
* Apr 2002 - Mar 2006, Kobe University Faculty of Science Department of Chemistry
